Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 131st/Eberhart
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana,134th, Langley, and 131st, due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana,134th, Langley, and 131st, due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Reroute near 83rd/Holland
ShortDescription: 24 Wentworth buses temp. rerouted SB: Vincennes, 83rd, Lafayette, and 87th; NB: 87th, State, and 83rd, due to street blockage near 83rd/Holland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 83rd/Holland, due to street blockage near 83rd/Hollande.

Southbound buses will operate via Vincennes, 83rd, Lafayette, and 87th.

Northbound buses will operate via 87th, State, and 83rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Laramie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Laramie.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
